description: City weather is defined by the unexpected. Be ready for whatever comes. The Solano’s GORE-TEX INFINIUM™ fabric is windproof, breathable, and resists rain. The brushed polyester lining wicks moisture and adds comfort. The comfortable relaxed fit is structured for clean lines and contemporary style, freedom of movement is built in with articulated patterning and gusseted underarms, and discrete reflective elements improve visibility – great for commuters who walk or ride.
name: Arcteryx Solano Jacket - Mens
